main: ^But be warned, you're in Jones' territory now. Don't underestimate him.
^He was harmless SYSADMIN before, but the virus changed him. He was able to infect networks of connected bots to build up his squadron.
^Even Dr. Fabio's Mark 3.0 Automated Defense Systems couldn't stop him when he came for the lab.
^The bots he's gotten to down here... they didn't choose this. We're all victims of the virus, in one way or another.
